title: Front-End
content: This is handy if you don't want to load SVG as a separate file. Don't forget the curly braces in the import! The ReactComponent import name is significant and tells Create React App that you want a React component that renders an SVG, rather than its filename.

title: Back-End
content: This is handy if you don't want to load SVG as a separate file. Don't forget the curly braces in the import! The ReactComponent import name is significant and tells Create React App that you want a React component that renders an SVG, rather than its filename.
